title: Lottie Like Button with Playback Control
description: Build an animated like button using Lottie with controlled playback.
instructions: Create a LikeButton widget that displays a heart Lottie animation. When tapped, it should play the animation forward (filling the heart). When tapped again, it should play in reverse (unfilling). Track the liked state and expose it via callback. The animation should only play on user interaction, not automatically.

hints.text: Use controller.value = 1.0 to set initial state to 'liked' without playing the animation
Use controller.forward() to play and controller.reverse() to unplay
Set the duration in onLoaded callback using composition.duration

commonMistakes.mistake: Playing the animation on init when initiallyLiked is true
commonMistakes.consequence: Heart animates filling when widget first appears
commonMistakes.correction: Set controller.value = 1.0 instead of calling forward()

commonMistakes.consequence: Memory leak and potential errors after widget disposal
commonMistakes.correction: Always call _controller.dispose() in the dispose() method
